description:
The true Hero is summoned to defeat the Devil King! Yet his journey starts with encountering both Last Bosses!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Wild Lufas Maphaahl and a Wild Devil King Have Appeared at the Same Time!!!
Une Luphas Mafahl et un Roi-démon sauvages apparaissent en même temps !
Yasei no Lufas Maphaahl to Yasei no Majin Ou ga Douji ni Arawareta!!!
¡Una Lufas Maphaal y un rey demonio salvajes han aparecido a la vez!
野生のルファス・マファールと野生の魔神王が同時に現れた!!!
